title: Hostel Checklist (List of Things you can carry)
content:
Lmk if i missed anything :)



Medicines

First Aid Kit (Bandages, cotton, some ointment)

Tablets (Headache, Fever, Diarrhea, Vomitings, Cold/Cough)



Toiletries



Brush/Tongue Cleaner

Toothpaste

Soaps/Body Wash

Facewash/Handwash

Combs

NailCutter

Shaving Cream/After Shave/Razor/Trimmer

Shampoo/Conditioner

Moisturizer/Sunscreen

Extra Creams/Serums/LipBam

Perfume/Deodorant 

Towels

Tissues

Bucket/Mug/Soap Case/Brush Stand



Accessories/Room Stuff



Mattress

Bedsheets/Blankets

Rug

Pillow/Pillow Covers

Mosquito Repellent

Clock

Markers/Duster

Clothes(Daily Wear, Clg Wear, Winter Wear)

Raincoat

Shoes/Sandals/Slides/Footwear

Socks

Belts

Lock for Closet / Lock for Room



Misc



Umbrella

Water Bottles/Cups

Table Lamp

Pen Stand

God Photo

Watch/Rings/Wearables/etc

Wallet(Imp cards, Aadhar, PAN etc)

PES Related Documents

Extension cord

Eye mask (if you can't sleep with¬†lights¬†on)



Digital



Phone/Charger

Tab/Charger

Laptop/Charger

Laptop/College Bag

Earphones/Headphones

Keyboard/Mouse/Mousepad

Monitor

Any other Gadgets



College



Any Required Books for Sem 1 & Sem 2

Notebooks

Stationery (Pen/Pencil/Erasers/Scale/ETC)

comments.body: Can add a small mirror and prolly sunglasses/cap
Are you aware which books are needed for the first semester
Nope ... Seniors told me that all the books are available at the library or just study from a digital copy
Dude, don't expose your identity on reddit¬†
I don't think you'll get space for keeping a monitor
I saw one senior taking a monitor
Which campus did you get into?
I think he is talking about your insta and twitter attached in your profile

Not to carry if a first timer 

Expensive items until you know ur surroundings 

Emotional baggage 

Homesick 

Clothing items which can be easily damaged if not maintained well 

Things which can be easily bought instead of carrying to reduce luggage ( cleansing n personal care items, mattress)
Already mentioned trimmer / razor .. blades can be bought there too

I meant that you posted the same thing on WhatsApp as well, where your name and number are visible. Reddit is meant to be anonymous, so don't post from your main account. Nonetheless, great work you are doing.

Ohh got it .. I'll make sure that doesn't happen again 
Thanks :)

Ohh got it .. I'll make sure that doesn't happen again 
Thanks :)
There is hostel bakery and campus mart where you can get most things
Try to get the books from Library rental  till semester end. Or 2nd hand from seniors
Don‚Äôt forget to carry playing cards üòÖ
Bro where can get a matress
